intro: Nerissa, commonly known as sea holly, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Plumbagaceae. It is characterized by its distinctive blue or purple flowers and silver-gray foliage. Its unique appearance makes it a popular choice for rock gardens and coastal landscaping.
